name: Dr Steph's Hippocampus Repair Stop
description:
Dr Steph's Hippocampus Repair Stop is a collection of brain stimulating minigames that are both easy to get into, and tough to master!

Try your hand at math problems with progressive difficulty in Fast Math, Simon Says with a twist in Turing Says, or a challenging object memory game in Look Out!

This game was made for Hack The North 2020++ in 36 hours! I hope to make some minor updates to this game to fix some issues, if you find any please let me know!

Made By:

Natalie Cordeiro

Nicholas Logan
